data.comment: The match is underway in Orlando.
Alex Chilowicz awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Orlando in the half of New England.
New England push upfield but Alex Chilowicz quickly pulls them for offside.
Alex Chilowicz awards New England a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New England.
Throw-in New England.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
In the minute 11, New England have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for New England.
Goal! New England take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Carles Gil spot-kick..
In the minute 18, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
In the minute 20, Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for Orlando, close to New England's area.
Kamal Miller for Orlando drives towards goal at Exploria Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 23, Orlando drive upfield and Antonio Carlos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a New England defender.
Orlando are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
It's now 0-2 in Orlando as Gustavo Bou scores for New England.
In the minute 27, It's a goal kick for the away team in Orlando.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
New England's Adam Buksa has been booked in Orlando.
In the minute 29, New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a New England throw-in in Orlando's half.
New England have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 31, Free kick New England.
Gustavo Bou for New England gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Orlando have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Free kick Orlando.
Orlando are back in the match in Orlando. Junior Urso has scored to make it 1-2.
In the minute 35, In Orlando Orlando attack through Oriol Rosell. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for New England at Exploria Stadium.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 38, New England's Adam Buksa gets in a shot on goal at Exploria Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
New England have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Throw-in for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 41, Orlando are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Orlando, Mauricio Pereyra of Orlando is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Orlando close to the penalty box.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
Alex Chilowicz awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for New England in the half of Orlando.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to New England.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of New England.
New England needs to be cautious. Orlando have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Orlando in Orlando.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Orlando to take a throw-in in New England territory.
In the minute 45, Can Orlando capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, New Englandâ€™s Matt Turner is on his feet again at Exploria Stadium.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Alex Chilowicz waits before resuming play because Matt Turner for New England is still down.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Orlando.
In the minute 47, Orlando's Nani misses with an attempt on goal.
New England have a goal kick.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New England.
Antonio Carlos (Orlando) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 48, Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
New England are pushing forward but Carles Gil's finish is wide of the goal.
Alex Chilowicz awards Orlando a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a New England throw-in in Orlando's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Goal kick for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
In the minute 53, Daryl Dike (Orlando) gets a yellow card.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Can Orlando capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New England's half?
In the minute 56, New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Important block from the New England defence as Mauricio Pereyra fires in a strike for Orlando.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Orlando.
Free kick New England.
Mauricio Pereyra (Orlando) is red-carded and dismissed.
In the minute 62, At Exploria Stadium, Nani has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Throw-in New England.
In the minute 64, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Can New England capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
Oscar Pareja (Orlando) is making a first substitution, with Andres Perea replacing Oriol Rosell.
New England's Gustavo Bou is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Brandon Bye is on a sub for Tajon Buchanan for New England.
New England make their first substitution with Kelyn Rowe replacing Teal Bunbury.
In the minute 68, New England have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In Orlando New England drive forward through Gustavo Bou. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to New England.
In the minute 73, Orlando have been awarded a penalty...
Nani (Orlando) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for New England in the half of Orlando.
Free kick in a good position for New England!
Junior Urso (Orlando) has received a yellow card from Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 77, Orlando have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
The home team replace Kyle Smith with Benji Michel.
Tesho Akindele is replacing Chris Mueller for the home team.
In the minute 78, Bruce Arena is making the team's third substitution at Exploria Stadium with Lee Nguyen replacing Matt Polster.
New England needs to be cautious. Orlando have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Orlando close to the penalty box.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for New England at Exploria Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of New England.
In the minute 83, Tesho Akindele (Orlando) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
New England take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Gustavo Bou.
That's a fine assist from Carles Gil.
New England will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Orlando.
In the minute 88, Orlando make their fourth substitution with Robinho replacing Junior Urso.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Orlando.
New England to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
Alex Chilowicz awards Orlando a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Orlando throw-in in New England's half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Orlando just outside New England's area.
Robinho of Orlando gets in a strike, but is off target.
New England have a goal kick.
New England to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
Alex Chilowicz blows to end the match. The final score is 1-3.
The away team replace Scott Caldwell with Tommy McNamara.
The away team have replaced Adam Buksa with Michael Mancienne. This is the fifth substitution made today by Bruce Arena.
